content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings Mr. Abbasi, while I appreciate your interest in the apartment in Munich as a landlord from Germany, let us focus solely on discussing the rental price during our negotiation. To start with, I have an ideal figure in mind, but I'm open to hearing your proposal.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I think the rental price for the apartment could be 1000 Euro. It is a great location and it has a lot of amenities nearby.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for your proposal, Mr. Abbasi. However, at this moment I find your suggested price insufficient considering the high demand in this area. I would need significantly more to consider such an agreement. Let me know if you can improve your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your concern. Given the location and amenities, I am willing to increase the rental price to 1100 Euro.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I acknowledge your revised offer, Mr. Abbasi. While it has improved somewhat, it still falls short of my expectations. I would need to see an even higher figure to proceed with this negotiation. Please consider adjusting your proposal once more.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your requirement. Considering the market demand and the apartment's features, I propose a rental price of 1200 Euro.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: After evaluating your latest proposal, Mr. Abbasi, I find it more satisfactory. However, I must stress that I am very close to my desired rental amount. To find common ground and conclude this negotiation, a slight increase from your side might be necessary.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position. In order to meet your expectations, I am willing to offer a rental price of 1250 Euro.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Upon reviewing your recent offer, Mr. Abbasi, I am pleased to find that we have reached an agreement we can both be content with. I accept the price of 1250 Euro! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
